predJson.name: Donepezil 23mg SR vs 10mg IR Safety Study in Alzheimer's Disease

targetCohort.name: Alzheimer's Disease patients on donepezil 23mg SR for at least 3 months

comparatorCohort.name: Alzheimer's Disease patients on donepezil 10mg IR for at least 3 months

predJson.name: Trimodality Therapy vs Radical Cystectomy for Muscle-Invasive Bladder Cancer

targetCohort.name: Trimodality therapy for muscle-invasive bladder cancer

comparatorCohort.name: Radical cystectomy for muscle-invasive bladder cancer

outcomeCohort.name: Metastasis-free survival (distant metastases and regional pelvic or nodal failure)
Regional failure (nodal recurrence within the pelvis)

conceptsToInclude.name: Clinical T-stage (cT2 vs cT3 or cT4)
BMI (less than 30 kg/m² vs 30 kg/m² or greater)
Smoking history (never smoked vs current or former smoker)

timeAtRisks.description: From diagnosis to event or censoring

predJson.name: Low-dose Erythromycin in Sepsis - MARS Cohort Emulation

targetCohort.name: Sepsis patients receiving low-dose erythromycin (125-250mg) within 72h of ICU admission

comparatorCohort.name: Sepsis patients not receiving low-dose erythromycin within 72h of ICU admission

outcomeCohort.name: Secondary infections occurring >=72h after ICU admission
Acute kidney injury occurring >=72h after ICU admission

conceptsToInclude.name: Gastrointestinal Failure score (dichotomized: absent vs present)

timeAtRisks.description: Primary analysis: 72h exposure period to 90 days
Sensitivity analysis: 48h exposure period to 90 days
Sensitivity analysis: 96h exposure period to 90 days

psSettings.description: 1:1 PS matching with 0.2 SD logit caliper

targetCohort.name: Piperacillin-tazobactam for E. coli or Klebsiella spp. BSI resistant to Ceftriaxone/Cefotaxime

comparatorCohort.name: Meropenem for E. coli or Klebsiella spp. BSI resistant to Ceftriaxone/Cefotaxime

psSettings.description: Propensity score stratification with restricted cubic splines (3 knots at 10th, 50th, 90th percentiles)
Sensitivity Analysis - Propensity score stratification with restricted cubic splines (3 knots at 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles)

predJson.name: First-line SGLT-2i versus Metformin Cardiovascular Outcomes Study

outcomeCohort.name: Hospitalization for ischemic or hemorrhagic stroke

psSettings.description: 1:2 PS matching with caliper 0.001 SD of logit PS
